songs.title: Against The Grain EP (Outro)
songs.lyrics:
[Outro]
That's right come again that's right from the roots cuz I still wear my Rikers Island boots
Ya’ll that's right we about to wrap it up and cap it up you know what I’m saying
Hey yo, thanks for tuning in, to WFUNKYOU, this is DJ Kush, don't push you know what I'm saying
Keep it hood nigga
